The claim originated from a Tagalog: language text shared on Facebook on March 3, 2021, stating that a 60-year-old woman in Japan died of brain hemorrhage three days after receiving the Pfizer-BioNTech Covid-19 vaccine.
The screenshot circulating on social med: s death as another victim of Pfizer in Japan, coinciding with the start of the Covid-19 vaccination drive in the Philippines on March 1, 2021.
The report from the local radio station: which was the source of the screenshot, clarified that experts had not established a causal link between the vaccination and the woman's death. The Japanese health official stated that brain hemorrhage is a common cause of death in the 40 to 60 age group.
The official report released by the Japa: BioNTech Covid-19 vaccine in the woman's death. It concluded that it was impossible to evaluate the causal relationship with the vaccine and highlighted that submucosal hemorrhage, which was suspected to be the cause of death, is relatively likely to occur in people in their 40s and 60s.
